snippet.title: Lets Play Skull Man Kills 2 (PC) (LIVE)
snippet.description:
Welcome to my blind live Let's Play of Skull Man Kills 2 (PC), an 8-bit Mega Man Classic fangame starring Skull Man, developed by RED-FIRE and released in 2017.

Link to the fangame: https://gamejolt.com/games/skull-man-kills-2-mega-man-2-ii-blood-vengeance/222333

Compared to its predecessor, which was only a boss rush game, this is a step up in terms of content. Despite being a "joke" game, all the levels feel and play like traditional classic RM stages. Not only that, all the levels have new enemies, bosses, and level gimmicks. Even Skull Man has two new moves up his skull-y sleeves.

Overall, this is a decent outing. Shame that it'll never get completed from the looks of it. If I'm proven wrong, I will return to produce a full LP.

This Let's Play was edited from the morning livestream on April 19th, 2020.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EtharonG
Follow me on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ethervilg/
Follow me on Mixer: https://mixer.com/Ethervil
Join my Discord Server: https://discord.gg/MAtmPSH

----

Mega Man is owned by Capcom. 
Skull Man Kills 2 was developed by RED-FIRE.
